thread.title: Big Brother Naija: Miyonse talks being nominated by Tboss, girlfriend's reaction
thread.title_full: Big Brother Naija: Miyonse talks being nominated by Tboss, girlfriend's reaction

author: Chidumga Izuzu
title: Big Brother Naija: Miyonse talks being nominated by Tboss, girlfriend's reaction
text: Tweet Ex Big Brother Naija housemates Soma and Miyonse were recently guests at the Pulse TV Nigeria Studios. During an exclusive interview with the housemates who were evicted on Sunday, February 5, 2017, Miyonse spoke on being nominated by his cuddle buddy Tboss. The housemate who had a girlfriend outside the house also spoke on her reaction to all the drama in the house. play Soma and Miyonse during an interview with Pulse Nigeria Read excerpts from the interview below; On Tboss Nominating him "I am disappointed, not surprised. It's a game eventually. I am rooting for her actually. Even if I am not pleased with the fact that she has given me a reason to have trust issues. But, it doesn't take away the fact that she is an amazing person. It doesn't take away the fact that I could have planned better. "Things might not go your way. If I had pulled it off the way I had it in my head, I would have been hailed as the master of strategy." ALSO READ: NIGERIA DOESN'T HAVE WHAT IT TAKES TO HOST BIG BROTHER NAIJA [OPINION] On Tboss Cozying up to him after nominating him "That for me is my major issue with her. The mere fact that TBoss nominated me... In fact, it was when she nominated me that we were closer. It was when she nominated me that I started sleeping on her bed. I felt like that's the highest point of betrayal. "She had the whole week to say 'you know what, I mistakenly did this." "There are just rules. There are rules, but you can always circumvent these rules. Like, someone came to meet me, and he told me that he nominated me because I was blocking his way with Tboss. She could have said something, I wouldn't feel bad."
